message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for us to end this quickly.
I think 55/45 is more fair, considering the inflation hits you harder
Bob, let's be realistic.  I'm taking a bigger hit from inflation with each round.  This offer leaves us both better off than your last one.
You're right, inflation hurts you more. But I'm not getting any less. I'll take a bit more this time.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm offering a 50/50 split. Take it or leave it.  This is my final offer.
